subject: Vulnerability with the Content Control plugin
preview: Hello Andy, We are writing to you today to notify you about a security vulnerability  discovered in the *Content Control* plugin. We detected the plugin on one or more of your websites:  • duracube

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli marked as Closed
Workflow **Vulnerability assigned to Manuel** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hello Andy, We are writing to you today to notify you about a security
vulnerability
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWukL6eYjGRlUZGKIx7PMBk86xDklNojY-2BfRs7gi7sOu4hHEKUl0snawL7pfbL5VkYAPnNmW2tUwbXRkdkAACIJME-3DKCpq_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKACpMEH8vtGPlvNTtt2eI-2Bsmr5Gseu94G-2BzUiHzo-2FBTZlLBWYqBvFZnLlsqfKMeN2OWpZ4iD0qzm8kQ5RmgQQ1Yyph-2FuuT8KTFLlNwh5plnB2zcNl-2BhdriL4WO8Mkvb4fwiZlwW8dezZyb2ErFoUTSMOZ3UPQkDKQRVEunNN2pimLdwTKMRnpMqnjf8n-2F9dulx6-2Byz4kxkPmKlzF2Sz0XX2>
discovered in the *Content Control* plugin. We detected the plugin on one
or more of your websites:

• duracube

*You can ignore this message if you have already deactivated Content
Control.*

The plugin has a vulnerability that makes it possible for *unauthenticated
visitors* to view posts that are restricted to logged-in users.

*There is no fix available.*

No fix is currently available, so we recommend deactivating the plugin
immediately. You can reactivate and update the plugin if the author issues
a fixed version in the future.

To deactivate the plugin, log in to the Admin section of your site, go to
Plugins > Installed Plugins > Content Control, and click the “Deactivate”
link under the plugin name.

This vulnerability may exist in both live and staging environments. We
recommend that both be checked and that the plugin be deactivated.

We detected this vulnerability on March 7th, 2025, at 12:08 PM UTC, but due
to the time difference between scanning for vulnerabilities and sending
notifications, you may have already removed the plugin.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for being a Kinsta client!


ID: content-control


The Kinsta Team
You are receiving this email because you have an account at Kinsta.
